verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Himself He could not save, What wondrous love is this! In love Himself He gave, There ne’er was love like His! Such love should melt a heart of stone, Till praise flows forth to Him alone!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Himself He could not save, Love's stream too deeply flowed, In love Himself He gave, To pay the debt we owed. Obedience to His Father's will, And love to Him did all fulfil.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And now exalted high: --- A Prince and Saviour He, That sinners might draw nigh And drink of mercy free, Of mercy now so richly shed, For Jesus liveth who was dead.{/lang-eng}
